scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run --cwd apps/server dev" "bun run --cwd apps/client dev"
scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun run --cwd apps/client build && bun run --cwd apps/server build
scripts.start: concurrently "bun run --cwd apps/server start" "bun run --cwd apps/client start"
scripts.type-check: bun run --cwd packages/shared type-check && bun run --cwd apps/client type-check && bun run --cwd apps/server type-check
